biography: Mikko is a golfer hailing from Kurk Golf, known for his meticulous approach to the game and his thoughtful demeanor on the course. While he may appear reserved at first glance, those who know Mikko well appreciate his dry wit and unwavering dedication to his craft.

Mikko has participated in the Hector Trophée on one occasion. Although the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have so far eluded him, Mikko continues to hone his skills and refine his strategy.
While Mikko will not participate in Hector Trophée 2025, his fans remain hopeful that he will return to the competition in the future.
